metadata.title: CVE-2024-31142 xen
metadata.description: Because of a logical error in XSA-407 (Branch Type Confusion), the mitigation is not applied properly when it is intended to be used. XSA-434 (Speculative Return Stack Overflow) uses the same infrastructure, so is equally impacted.  For more details, see:   https://xenbits.xen.org/xsa/advisory-407.html   https://xenbits.xen.org/xsa/advisory-434.html
